settings.title: IS BAMBOO TOILET PAPER SOFT?
settings.content: Soft is subjective. Take a look at the reviews by going to the product page and scrolling down to the bottom. The majority of reviewers feel the toilet paper is soft, silky and a much better experience than other dusty and crumbly papers that are on the market. The team at No.2 thinks No.2 bamboo toilet paper is not only soft, it's also way stronger and provides for a better pull while you're wiping.

settings.title: WHY USE BAMBOO?
settings.content: Bamboo is one of the fastest growing, strongest and most useful plants on the planet. With the ability to grow more than a meter a day, bamboo is a renewable resource that reaches maturity in 4-6 years or less; in sharp contrast, trees require decades (20 to 50 years) to recover from harvesting. Truly a wonder of nature, bamboo grows easily, even in environmentally stressed areas and unique settings like mountainsides and steep slopes, where other crops cannot. The plant thrives in depleted soil and when it is cut, the stem is left in the soil to sprout a new shoot and start the growing process again. Releasing 30% more oxygen into the atmosphere and absorbing more carbon dioxide in comparison to other plants, bamboo protects the environment as it grows and even helps to reduce soil erosion. Bamboo paper is recyclable. Just like paper made from wood pulp, bamboo paper can be recycled to lessen our impact on the environment and further reduce our reliance on trees and the catastrophic environmental effects of clear-cutting and deforestation. Overall, bamboo offers us strength, sustainability, versatility, and an environmentally responsible alternative. Some tree free products use fillers like sugar cane and recycled material or even virgin tree pulp fibers, No. 2 toilet paper is 100% bamboo.

settings.title: WHY IS BAMBOO TOILET PAPER SUSTAINABLE?
settings.content:
Some fascinating and eye-opening facts:
Americans consume 20% of the world's toilet paper.
Most toilet paper usage in the US comes from Canada, depleting their forests and causing devastating environmental damage.
By using bamboo toilet paper, you will save 384 trees in your lifetime.
Bamboo forests mature in 4 to 6 years versus the 20 to 50 years it takes for trees to recover from harvesting.
You have made a great decision to switch to not just 100% bamboo toilet paper, also to No.2 toilet paper.

Truly a wonder of nature, bamboo grows easily, even in environmentally stressed areas and unique settings like mountainsides and steep slopes, where other crops cannot. The plant thrives in depleted soil and when it is cut, the stem is left in the soil to sprout a new shoot and start the growing process again. Releasing 30% more oxygen into the atmosphere and absorbing more carbon dioxide in comparison to other plants, bamboo protects the environment as it grows and even helps to reduce soil erosion.

settings.title: CAN YOU RECYCLE BAMBOO?
settings.content: Bamboo paper is recyclable. Just like paper made from wood pulp, bamboo paper can be recycled to lessen our impact on the environment and further reduce our reliance on trees and the catastrophic environmental effects of clear-cutting and deforestation.

settings.title: WHAT IS YOUR RETURN POLICY?
settings.content: The bottom line is this: your happiness is our business. If your order is lost, injured, or mauled by bears in transit, we are happy to replace it as fast as humanly possible (certain restrictions apply). We do not process refunds and do not accept toilet paper cartons back once they've shipped out for sanitary reasons. We do provide replacements if the product is, for some reason, damaged or defected.

settings.title: WHERE DOES NO.2 TP SHIP FROM?
settings.content: Currently, we ship from California and Nevada warehouses.

settings.title: CAN I CANCEL MY ORDER?
settings.content: You can cancel your order if it has not yet been prepared to ship or shipped. Once it ships, it is not longer eligible for cancellation.

settings.title: HOW CAN I MANAGE MY SUBSCRIPTION?
settings.content: Login to "my account" located at the bottom of the site. There you will see a button to "manage subscription." If you are having trouble making changes, email us and we'll help you make changes to your subscription.

settings.title: WHAT CHANGES CAN I MAKE TO MY SUBSCRIPTION?
settings.content: Great question! Once you subscribe, you can cancel at any time. You can also skip your next deliveries or as many future deliveries as you need to skip. You can change your shipping address, your billing information, your payment information, or you can make updates to your carton size and pattern style selections. Nothing is permanent. You can always make edits. If you cannot figure out how to do it online once you login, email us and we will help you make the changes you need.

settings.text: Still have questions? We're happy to help! Please email us at hello@rizzi.com and we will get back to you within 24 hours.
